document_data.mainbody:
he Perfect Charm of Lolth was a unique sword knot, a charm to be attached to a weapon, part of a set alongside the Perfect Fang of Lolth, forged deep in the Demonweb Pits, the Abyssal layer ruled by Lolth, The Demon Queen of Spiders.
The Perfect Charm was an ornate charm decorated with ancient magical runes of the Demonweb Pits.
This powerful Lolthite weapon knot was created to rend the souls of the enemies of the Spider Queen. Its powers increased when it was wielded alongside the Perfect Fang of Lolth. The Perfect Charm magically shielded its wielder from incoming damage when their stamina was exhausted during battle. At the beginning of each battle, the charm increased the wielders chance of dealing increased damage with a lucky or well-aimed attack.
The knots magic made it usable by barbarians only.
The Perfect Fang of Lolth and the Perfect Charm of Lolth were forged in eons past deep in the Demonweb Pits. The items found their way to the Prime Material plane in the late 15 century DR, possibly ending up in the hands of drow and adventurers of the Northdark who challenged the beholder deity Gzemnid, or barbarians who survived a descent into the Demonweb Pits and a battle with Lolth herself.
